meanings.definition: A person who hosts or organizes a quiz.
meanings.sent1: The quizmaster asked the questions during the trivia night.
meanings.sent2: The quizmaster announced the next round of the quiz competition.
meanings.sent3: The quizmaster made sure everyone had fun while answering the quiz questions.
meanings.sent4: The quizmaster's voice boomed through the room, commanding attention.
meanings.sent5: The quizmaster's smile was warm and inviting, putting the participants at ease.

meanings.sent1: She will quizmaster the event by reading out the questions.
meanings.sent2: He quizmasters the weekly trivia game at the local pub.
meanings.sent3: They decided to quizmaster the family game night for a change.
meanings.sent4: The teacher quizmastered the school quiz bee with enthusiasm.
meanings.sent5: The host quizmastered the game show with humor and flair.
